text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter, including rules for the valuation of the factors to be considered under § 50-551.06.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 1009 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 10-551.01

Delegation of Authority

Delegation of Rulemaking Authority to the Department of General Services, see Mayor's Order 2011-168, October 5, 2011 (58 DCR 8842).

DC CODE § 10-551.08

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)
